text: Masoud Zaribafan () is an Iranian conservative politician. He was formerly a Tehran councilor, vice president and cabinet secretary during Presidency of Mahmoud Ahmadinejad. == References == Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Alliance of Builders of Islamic Iran politicians Category:Coalition of the Pleasant Scent of Servitude politicians Category:Society of Devotees of the Islamic Revolution politicians Category:Tehran Councillors 2003–2007 Category:Heads of Foundation of Martyrs and Veterans Affairs Category:YEKTA Front politicians Category:Iranian campaign managers
title: Masoud Zaribafan
